name: Foxlings
description:
Foxling's is an open source, student project created during a Cert IV at TAFE.

Lead Programmer - Joshua (@TyrdleTweets)
Lead Artist - Jayden (@Jay_Claxxon)

Play as a loving Mother Fox looking for her pups who have been captured by Hunters. Stay hidden and try not to get caught whilst you solve semi-linear puzzles in a vibrant polygonal world. Save your pups and bring them back to the den.

A spiritual successor to the Shelter series, mixed with original Metal Gear Solid stealth and a brightly coloured flat Low Poly art style.

Genre: Survival, Puzzle, Top Down
